channel.title: Newslogger | Bitroot
channel.description: Thoughts, tutorials, and insights from the Bitroot team.

item.title: Google Unveils Glimmer: A Revolutionary Design Language for UX on Smart Glasses
item.description:
Google introduces Glimmer, a new design language for UX on glasses that prioritizes voice, gesture, and eye-tracking, and discover its potential to transform the way we interact with smart glasses. This innovation is set to revolutionize the field of UX design and beyond.

Source:

  • https://x.com/i/status/2023805464577011979

item.title: Revolutionary AI-Powered Desktop Agent Unveiled: Interpreter
item.description:
Today I'm launching Interpreter. It's a desktop agent that can fill PDFs, edit your Excel and Word docs, and learn new skills. Runs offline, works with any model, and it's free.

Source:

  • https://x.com/i/status/2024227639087813035

item.title: Revolutionizing AI-Powered Apps with Secure Docker Sandboxes
item.description:

item.title: India's Tech Landscape Shifts: Why Deeptech and Hardware Are the Future
item.description:
